PerfectNetExp.abs: 小白菊（Feverfew） 花语：清澄（Clear） 这是一种带有清爽香气的芳香植物。英国人认为，这种香气能够净化周围的空气，所以为 …
进出口行业词汇英语翻译(F) ... fever-reducing suppository for children 小儿解热栓 feverfew 白菊花 fez 圆筒形无边毡帽.
菊科植物 （ Feverfew ）：这种植物的干叶用来缓解头痛也有几个世纪的历史了。American feverfew ：草原酸膜 ［食品词典］A8.
野甘菊 (Feverfew)：目前针对野甘菊是否有预防偏头痛的疗效已经进行了5项双盲研究。结果显示每日服用一粒 (用整个) 野甘菊制成的 …

list.abs: animal experiment shows that the coumar ether compound extracted from feverfew can treating bronchial asthma , bronchitis and emphysema effectively .动物实验证明，这类从菊科植物中提取的香豆草醚类化合物可有效治疗和改善支气管哮喘、慢性支气管炎、肺气肿的症状。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English feferfuge, from Latin febrifuga, from febris 'fever' + fugare 'drive away'. Compare with febrifuge

means.word_mean: 1. bushy aromatic European perennial herb having clusters of buttonlike white-rayed flower heads; valued traditionally for medicinal uses; sometimes placed in genus Chrysanthemum
